data.text: The game and idea of it is fun and great but there is too many problems. I even purchased a small beginner's pack to start off 20 level and to remove ads. Still hard to play and beat any levels. There's a bad error now that U can't even use the magnet. If U run into the magnet it's supposed to automatically scoop up anything within a certain radius of U but since a about a week ago it doesn't even work and actually now glitches to where U can't pick ANYTHING up with the magnet. Disappointing!

Multiple problems, 1. There are so many ads after you win or die. 2. It's so hard to win because somehow people are reaching lvl 100 in 10 to 15 seconds and you barely can eat others. 3. When you get to the next bos level, there is less lvl ball things than there is in the 1st boss level. 4. It's so hard to get higher than the bosses level. It's a very fun game tho. 3/10

Game is fun, but all the ads suck the fun right out of it. Unfortunately I'm Uninstaller due to excessive ads. If you're defeated it asks if you want to watch an ad for a multiplier of the points for that play, even if you click no thanks it forces you to watch an ad anyway. Why bother asking?? Take the amount of ads down a notch or two, and I will love to reinstall and update my rating.

I really like this game there are lots of ads but you can get out of them easily just close the app and re open it but don't shut out the app just click out and back on and the ads are gone it takes less then 5 seconds to do that the only reason I am giving it four stars is because it does get annoying sometimes I would give it three/3 stars it really needs to update but I have only been playing it for a day and overall it's fun I am on like level 5 or 6 so far so yeah it's fun overall!

Too many ads, considering it stops MID play to watch the same ad from the lady 40 times. The upgrades are terrible, buy one and you have to watch an ad, and when you do watch it, it doesn't upgrade. The bosses are too difficult and there's not enough time to play a single round. I always get the same exact Highscore of 1140, and never does it get higher!

They make it very hard to get enough to "beat the boss" almost impossible. There isn't enough time on the timer. I like that they give you upgrades by Watching ads but you'd have to spend an entire day watching ads to have enough level ups just to get anywhere. They don't give an option to lengthen the timer. I'm about to delete the game simply because I can't even progress enough to want to keep playing. You can get hundreds of different skins but you can't even get enough time to beat the boss

It was fun in the beginning when you could easily win most of the matches, and it seems fair, though I'm sure the vast majority of opponents are bots. Then, somewhere along the line, they must match you according to "skill"... However, it becomes play to win. You can buy something that gives you 20 lvls for equipping it. You could watch an ad, and get 10 for free.... every single *short* match... Buuuut, the second you start, several opponents are 10-20 lvls ahead of you. And ads are constant

The ads are atrocious, but the most recent update broke the game. They changed it so the bosses aren't as difficult to beat as they were before, which is nice, but now the bosses only go up to level 2350, and once you beat the level 2350 boss 10 times or so, the game just crashes at the end of the level. It's clear the developers don't care about a playable game, it's just a cash grab for them with all the ads!! So glad I didn't spend $$ on this garbage.

I am loving this game, but it keeps on rushing at the end of watching any ad. It doesn't give me the reward for watching the ad, it simply closes the game and I would have to start all over again. Nevermind, instead of rating it 2 stars, I'm changing it to 1 star. The game crashing is way too much. Can't even e joy playing the game because of it. The game has become super lagging. Makes it difficult to play and enjoy.

Update 14th March still Major issues!!!!Issue with my user name being reverted to "Player" and no way of changing it. The magnet still has no effect at all, I literally watched the magnet collect surrounding items and it added nothing to my total. Its become quite frustrating as you have to avoid it. The power ups are also pointless, my speed has had no improvement, even though its level 250, Please sort it out!!! Minor bugs not fixed, no new content!!!!

data.userName: • k i t ¿ k a t ¡ •
data.text: Game is horrible, super short and ad-filled. Upgrades don't help at all, and the bots will always get to atleast 50+ levels when you start the game, and its super unfair. Super easy to get eaten by others, small map, and slow snakes. Would recommend not to download, because it is legit impossible to play the game, and you mostly end up getting eaten or game ends too quickly so you dont have enough time to build up levels for the boss.

I wanted to love it. But the powerups, don't actually power you up! I'm on the level where the boss is 2000. I can't get close to beating it. The clock runs out when I'm at 1600max. I've upgraded the speed so many times but but it's not faster, so there just isn't time to get that high. Even when I'm finishing with the highest ranks snake and have the crown. Honestly, it's just become frustrating, because there's no progression to keep you engaged.

We all get the need to advertise to play free games now. However, the rounds go so quick in this game you literally spend more time watching ads then playing. Not worth downloading : UPDATE : so I did Paid version. Seemed fun enough game. Don't buy either. Only game mode option available is timed. Every round. Sucks. Game was clearly made just to be a cash cow.

I like this game, my 3 year old son loves it. He likes to race me to see who can eat the boss first, I play on my phone and he plays on my iPad. The excitement he gets when he eats the boss is amazing. However since the upgrade my boss level is now 4200, which is impossible...the iPad was fixed this am when he got up, his boss level is 6200. I fear I will never see that level of excitement in him again. You upgrade the items, but they(magnet) are rare to find. The newest upgrades are horrible

New update has removed my username and some others and replaced with 'Player' doesn't seem to be a way to change this anymore. Also update has slowed the magnet booster so it barely works.....seems like my level 60 magnet is back to level one and lasts less than 2 seconds....update has removed the bonus effects from the skins.....sad because before the update, I would have rated 5*. (Paid for no ads)

Game is good but rounds are to short, there is too manny stupid ads if you want to proceed. Sometimes there are bugs when you watch ad then snake "glitch" or it restart the game. Lots of errors in game after the event finished. When you get "magnet" power up it doesn't work well...

with the recent update the game bugs out way worse, the magnet no longer works properly and the amount of bots they added to the game now makes it super glitchy. Most of the "players" bodies glitch off the map or people twice my size randomly spawn directly beside you or in front of you. I enjoy this game and it's basically the only one I play now, but it's definitely in need of more updates

Could be a fun game, but the forced ads ruin it. Plus the no ads purchase is converted to local currency, not the price displayed. Your optional ads to boost profits would be worth watching, if you weren't inflicting forced ads when skipping them. Forced ads = forced delete.

Game is fun but when they updated it at least for me I can no longer buy coins for upgrading my snake faster got to watch videos in order to upgrade it now I liked it better where you had the option to use your debit card and buy coins so you can upgrade faster That's the only thing I don't like about it I also like the idea that you could give your snake a name but since the last update I came and changed my snake name it just says player

Great game, however I hate how it has so many ads. Each level has a timer and at the end of that level you are asked if you want to watch an ad for more coins or say no thanks. After hitting no thanks an ad pops up anyways. It's really frustrating.

App is completely broken as of 3/10 or 3/11. My snake no longer moves and it disappears as soon as time starts. I've actually had a lot of fun playing over the last couple months, except the fact that it's impossible to reach over 11,000 to beat the boss now.

I really liked this game till I noticed how it freezes up and then I noticed it only does it during certain things like when I'm trying to be revived and just watched a 60 sec ad. I don't like games that purposely freeze up users games for bot players to always win. Now I'll be uninstalling

I dont know whats going on with the game now, but my upgrades dont work at all, when I buy for example a level upgrade it takes my coins( yay) but doesn't actually upgrade it. (Stays on the same level) then, when i catch a magnet in the game it doesn't work? This has been happening for 2 days now. Please fix this

Ok I like this game its actually addictive and the ad control isn't half as bad as other games ya when u die u have to watch some but u choose if u want 4x the coins watch 25-30 seconds of ads or if not u watch 5-10 but they don't interrupt ur game and force u the longer u play the shorter the ads get. I would like to see a couple changes when u eat someone that ate a power up u should get that power up too and I made my name eater and it went away and I can't change it back I'm player now?

Ever since the most recent update, my game doesn't play correctly. My snake only has a head and doesn't move at all when the game starts. No other snakes can been seen during the game. It also shows that the snake is level 99 when it's over 1000.

This game has infinite numbers of ads. Please don't use "We need ads to run this game/keep it alive". You don't need ads to keep the game running so please don't provide unreasonable and invalid excuses because a lot of games existing now have proven to. The 2x speed revive doesn't allow me to move after watching an ad. The leaderboard doesn't make sense because no.1 will never be no.1. 5 star reviews here are either bots or paid. A broken game full of ads definitely deserves a 0 star review.
This game is ssoooooooo good i play this game for hours, but the problem is that after every round a ad shows up and the ad is 30 seconds, but still not a lot of ads. That's why 4 stars. ⭐⭐⭐⭐

The game is actually entertaining but for 1 minute of gameplay you watch 5 minutes of ads ,there's one add cutting a big chunk of the screen while you play, forced pop ups everywhere and a whole lot more of ads to watch to multiply your rewards and even more for upgrades and temporary bonus. This app is 90% ads and 10% a game.

I love this game it's very fun but it doesn't give you enough time to play and every time the game ends I have to sit through possibly 2 long adverts and it gets so boring with a short time playing and to wait to get through many ads before I get to set up a new game. And then in the short time I get of just over 1 minute I can only get up to 1700 level snake and the boss skipped ahead from 2150 to 3200 when an upgrade occurred. Before, the snakes all just travelled straight but now they move ar

This game is so underrated and hard, they don't give enough time, like level 3? More like level 56, and I finally beated level 3 while the boss is over 1799, now that's impossible, and I couldn't even get to 900 with that point, and the other snakes are spawning near other snakes but me? Just no I'm spawning nowhere, I couldn't find any any snakes on my way so how can I level up, and the point is u gotta watch so many ads to level up, 2 days straight watching ad would probably get you to lvl 4.

Lost ability to change name. Only rating two stars for this reason because there's no option to change my name. For some reason I got set back to player and there's no option to change it. Will be uninstalling soon.

WORST GAME EVER!!!!! The minute I opened the game it shut off my music. If there was a game that deserves ZERO STARS, it would be this one. Other than never getting to play the game, it was awesome. Uninstalling now.

Hi,snake clash is the best! I would've rated it 5 stars , but i have to rate a 3 cos 1: every time you finish a game , an add comes up and 2: when i press close on the add on the bottom of the screen, it says we've got rid of it but IT KEEPS COMING UP OVER AND OVER AGAIN. I like the game,Supercent, but PLS get rid of constant adds!! Thnks.

Full of ads!!! You click No Thanks for the prize... You still get an AD!!!! ADs every where!!! It's not a game it's ads ads ads ads!!! So annoying!! Not worth your time! Uninstalled this piece of trash!

Initially a fun way to pass the time. Simple easy concept. However, quickly realized there is no way to advance. The "power-ups" in game, mainly the magnet, are so few and far between, it becomes virtually impossible to progress in the game as you're never able to achieve enough to beat the end of level boss. Even if you watch ads to gain each power up before starting the level, it's next to impossible to beat the level. First couple of levels are doable. Now it's just a waste of time.

I do really like this game a lot! I only gave it a 4 for the ease of maneuvering my snake. It was difficult with my older hands but getting the hang of it. Once I discover I it's me or the game I'll change it to 5 if it's just me. invited some others to try and we shall see. But I would recommend it for sure. fun entertaining and a good way to unwind.

ALMOST worth the adds and crashes The speed up and item upgrades seem to make no difference. There is no description, just what level it is. If I buy a speed up I wish I knew how much faster it is if I bought it. If I buy the item upgrade I don't know if the item lasts longer or had a wider range. I do see a difference in start level though. But if the game would stop crashing and it was more descriptive I'd spend money. Also wish there was an eternal mode. Might uninstall.

So far I'm going to give this one a 2* it has a lot of potential to be really fun but the bord is to big for the time frame you have to win and I find that I usually don't even get to see another snake till I've got 10 seconds left on the timer, seconds there are WAY to many adds 😮‍💨 like one or two ads would be ok but an add every time you do anything is just boring. I get more add time then actual playing time

I like this game a lot it is very fun to play , however you have to grind the commercials to progress. What I do is watch Crunchyroll or Netflix and I press a commercial on my phone. I "watched" 400 commercials on the game 200 for level and 200 for speed. I can beat just about any boss on any level. The best way to grind is just spam the ad button while you watch something else.

I love the classics, this is a good version of snake. Although I'm not sure the high score board works correctly? Apparently I'm first overall, but I can't be, I'm only level 63. Also need more tasks. But still very playable.

To many ads that won't load! I have to reboot the game every time it runs an ad (at the end of every round) because the ads won't load and it just gives me a black screen This also resets my apple timer so I can't partake in the event and I also can't claim any ad based rewards because of it

Full of glitches. It will tell you your first even showing a crown on your head for the end scene. Only to see your 3rd on the leaderboard lol. Each game is 2 minutes and you have to watch x3 adds after every single game. Not enough players on the map you will spend half your time just looking for other players. Gave it 2 stars as it has amazing potential to be a great arcade game. Just a pathetic finish though. Wouldn't recommend as the bugs spoil it. Bouncing off people your are bigger than.

So Many Ads! Game itself is pretty good, mechanics are fairly responsive Game weights are pretty heavy against the user, it's very difficult to beat bosses Better off to play in airplane mode to avoid ads;)

frikkin ads😪played it on my children's tablets n because they weren't always on the internet it didn't have ads....so downloaded it on my phone n turned mobile data off so I didn't have to see any ads...n the ads still played ...and No I had no wifi going...and even when I clicked NO THANKS for the extra coins ad was still playing Like the Frustration is real...n There should be extra time given for the Boss Snakes you do beat....and Level ups CmOn...let it be a Level up...Pathetic

It's an ad generator / battery drainer. There is an ad at the end of each 1:30 mins of play, even if you don't want the extra reward Sometimes the ad lasts longer than game play and you have to wait for tiny little x to appear to leave the ad once it's done. The game is fun, just want to be able to play more of it at a time.

Ads, ads for upgrades, ads for money, real money to remove ads, ads when you open the app, ads when you finish a match, ads for skins, ads for second chance on n the match, ads for extra gold at the end of a match. The gameplay is simplistic which is cool, but it's a nothing at the end of a the timer, you face the "Boss" which you always lose UNLESS you're over it's power level like 1,200 or something.

Way too many adds. Even at the end of a game, you could watch an ad for extra reward. You say no and still have to watch an ad. Most ads are 40s plus. Ads mid game as well that you can't skip. Game has potential if they weren't so greedy with having so many ads. In 10 mins of playing, 7.5 of that was ads I couldn't skip and was compulsory to watch. Looking at the 5 star reviews on here, seem to come from bots/paid positive reviews as a lot of copy and paste reviews.

Developers!! Please stop those unwanted ads.. thise pop ups after finishing the level... It seems like we are only watching ads ..... The ad timings are more then that of playing the game.. no wonder its so irritating.. one will have to move to the mods .. its a suggestion to the developer.. just remove the unwanted ads .. we are watching the ads to power it up so plz remove those ads which suddenly pop up.. thanks

The game is fun, but it has too many ads. 1 minute game and then 1 minute ad. Absolutely atrocious. You need to pay if you want to game instead of watching ads. Even if you click to skip watching the add it still shows it to you. Hate such kind of developers.

It's fun no need to pay. Do level up first then do items speed is not necessary. You get eaten a lot very quickly but once you get a bit of level up you get going the more you eat the faster you grow during match. 01.30 minutes timer each match if you can last that long. I am called Sly in game currently number 1 ranked

I absolutely love playing this game. I'm so addicted. I have the Fold 5 so I have so much extra screen and it makes it that much better. However, I had to give it 2 stars because as much as I love playing this game it constantly shuts down on me. Freezes on, goes black in the middle of of a game and that is so incredibly frustrating.

Not suitable for young kids. Although the rating says PEGI 3 (suitable for all) I have noticed some of the adverts are for horror style games. One minute my 5 year old is happily playing snakes, the next a zombie is jumping at the screen from an advert that you have no control over (you cannot even pay to remove them). I played abit more on my own and had a 2nd horror type game advert. The game is good fun, shame it's not suitable for kids.

Game just stopped working after beating it so many times. Couldn't even collect more coins because it will continuously crash. Also the ranking stopped working and stopped winning and prize or money. Shame because I really enjoyed the game when it actually worked.

Please fix! Can't finish a game. When you get to the end where you face the boss snake, it only shows its head and then freezes. I don't get my rewards and have to force close the game. As well I see multiple players with names.. I can't find any place where I can add/change my name.

I prefer snake io or merge snake because of the short time limit and unfair gameplay. Don't recommend it, and don't bother upgrading the items, it's waste of money. I did pay for ads removal but it's not very useful.

I like how even if you pay for "ad free" you literally can't play this game without looking at ads. This company is pathetic, they just exploit your time and make you watch ads which is sad because it's actually a fun game. After each round you are forced to watch a ad, you can't even skip it / the reward boost to move on to the next round.

Ehh, i thought it was gonna be more like slither.io but youre playing with bots so it doesnt feel challenging. I think you can play online with some people but still lots of bots but its not as fun, you have to use "apples" and while youre "online" playing with people you have ads pop up in the middle of it

Too many ads! I can't even enjoy the moment and it crushes, too! And also the time limit is way too short maybe you can add some uprade to the time limit. Nevertheless, its a good game if you can improve it.

Only play this game if you want to become a loser. When you start the game, eating level1 snakes your level increases to a higher number instantly. But as The snake reaches around 100 points. The level inc. only 1 every time you eat something. If the snake level is 400 and if it eats a 300level snake my level does not increase to 700, Somewhere near 426. At the end all of a sudden there will be a high level snakes and finish your game. Playing 30times for each level. Headache. Uninstalling.

How about not designing a game purely based on using money to progress and placing adds in the middle of your game? If it wasn't for the add every round, middle of the games, and every other add is unskippable for 30+ seconds it would be a enjoyable game but instead of buy able things being FUN it's forced so you can progress...so

It's not very well thought out. Play time is VERY short before they put you up against a random boss. A lot of times you can't even grow properly. Your performance depends on where you are. Sometimes it takes more than 1 min to find the other snakes so you can't even grow until then. Sometimes you can start growing right away, but your performance only depends on the other players (or AI players). I've ranked 1st or 2nd and still be too small to face the boss cause of lack of time to grow.
I was having fun with it until it started just saying timed out at the beginning and then playing ads over and over again. it won't let me play at all. I click to start it immediately says timed out.

My 8 year old loves this game and was doing well with her progress but after I had reset her tablet back to factory settings she lost all her progress. Thought the idea of playstore games was it saves your progress
Probably the worst of the snake survival type games out there. nonstop ads. if you become the biggest, it just spawns in a bigger snake. And it's fully single player

I lost my nickname and I cannot change it again. Only 'player' available. The magnet thing is not working too. Usually when I got the magnet, I will eat all food around me but this time not working at all. Fix it please, maybe because too much ads in your game.

This game is very fun and intertaning it is very time consuming and fun the skins in this game are very cool you can get bigger and bigger as you go the more I play the more fun spent my family and I truly love this we like having battles seeing how will die first and how can last the longest I should my friend this game and she loved and we played together we spent all night playing and watching videos we had so much fun to the creators of this game just the one I hate is the time limit 😒
Game gets slower and slower the more levels you beat, and sometimes you are just stopped in midplay. Maybe if this was fixed the game would be better.

Love the game it's so cool and want to play but there are two many ads and its gets legs sometimes so make sure to get all the legs out of this game and it's less than less ads and I try my best to get everyone to give the best review for you guys I love this game

I like the game and everything but i don't like the bonus round and i don't like the timer it would be helpful if you deleted the timer and the bonus fight please i don't like those ones because i don't like getting timed to see if i can beat the boss fight please delete those two please please please thank you for reading this essay.

I used to really enjoy this game but now it's not as good. What bothers me is that the magnets don't work well. They don't pull in the balls like they used to. It's EXTREMELY SLOW and doesn't last long at all... about 2 secs. They need to put it back to how it used to be. If it doesn't get fixed I'm deleting the game.
Not exactly sure what the goal is of the game. I'm just trying to reach lvl 3 to obtain the points for Add it up. I've been eaten more in the past 10 minutes than in all 18 years of marriage. 🤷🏼‍♀️

It's decent. Not worth the £4.79 I paid to get rid of the ads though, much better games around for a similar price. Purely bought it out convenience as forced ads every run / every 30 seconds - minute is just ridiculous. Three stars for the fun factor, two taken away for yet again, egregious ad placement.
It's hard to tell if the leader board is accurate. if you play on different devices there are different people listed. The game glitched and I can't change my player name. other than that it's fun.

My son LOVES this game! It was glitching a bit (the boss snake wasn't there, it would get stuck on the boss fight) so we uninstalled and reinstalled. It seems it's fixed, however we no longer have our event snakes that we won... if that didn't happen we'd give 5 stars.
Not the best snake game available. Power ups don't seem to do much, enemy snakes mysteriously level up really fast. You have to watch 10,000 adverts to power up enough to beat the boss level.

Fun except for the seasonal stuff. It'll show I collected 9 items but only give me 4.. such as I will collect 9 chocolate donuts when the game is active, but when I die, it says I only collected 4. It's frustrating knowing I've collected over the required amount for a skin but still haven't gotten it.

Man I remember playing this game on a Nokia cell phone and it was very challenging back then too but this new version of it is even better because you get to eat other snacks and get to choose what kind of snack you wanna be!!! so much fun

Fun game but the rounds are WAY too short. It end the moment it starts getting good. EVERY TIME. If you added a longer time limit or a mode with infinite time called Last Snake Standing, that would be dope af and would give 5 Stars.
It's enjoyable. It takes me back to when I played snakes on the old Nokia, but the ads are a bit extreme. Every time I finish a game, there's an ad. Uninstalling.
I don't think you can win in this game, most of the "player" or bots are mostly 20 levels ahead even if u upgrade you're level and the boss? Impossible what ever it takes you can't beat the game.

difficult to get anywhere, the massive snakes just plow through us, there is no defense, you need to hide and lots of luck to grow to any size, but then you become targets for the massive snakes, and they come along and crush you, this totally sucks, delete and move on!!!

What game I ever played?It took ten minutes just to get to the next boss And an add every 2 seconds. I would not recommend downloading this game. If I could. I would weigh it as 0. Not fun at all, One Star😡

peak i wanted to ask if the leaderboard is worldwide, bc i thinks it's kinda crazy if im #1 in the world for this game I don't think it is tho😭😭 also a strategy that I have if anybody wants it, is to go towards where it says 1st place is. most of the time there's gonna be alot of people around them, that's how they get so many points. so just go over there and just avoid their face and only go near snakes smaller than you (if that makes sense)
grow up, pay for no ads, it's cheap. Thanks for fixing the events and for the nerf to finish! 11k boss!?!? i can barely get 2k snake!! unlimited play option would be awesome.
Way too many ads, even after pressing "no thanks" to turn down the rewards, boom. Ads. In the middle of the event game? Boom. Ads. Breathe? Boom. Ads

I love this game I do. However... the timer. we NEEED more time please! I was thinking that maybe after you beat a boss you get some more time on the timer? because I swear there is no way to get more than 2000 points in a minute and a half... love ya tho!
Not great, would be better without a time limit, but you do get coins quickly, I would not recommend over some of the other worm games, but it is better than some.

I really want to like the game.. but there are 2 problems, advertisement and time constraints.. I'm in level 1800 I want to play it but there is so little time it's like I started playing the game and Little did I know I'm done playing.. it's really irritating..

Very good game....some time increase could implemented After recent update....it sucks... everytime it hangs after fight with boss ....no rewards coming ....no back tab working....only left with stop game and restart game...even after restartsame happen

Bug in game. I guess there is a bug in the game. It just kept stuck in boss level 2350 even if I finish it. Initially I was in level 3400, after the recent upgrade it went to 2200, but it is not moving after 2350. Just fix it.
Its starting to crash. The ending when im going up agaisnt the big snake the head only shows. Then it stops working. Have to close out app then restart. Still doesnt fox problem
Very addictive and fun but gets a bit boring after unlocking most skins. Final boss jumped from level 2350 to 9800 which is impossible and offputting.
Love the game but the ads freeze on a black screen and crash the game and you have to go back in, can't get your boosts very frustrating

played about v 3 games .... Based on the fact that it's a game of snake but only 90 seconds a round...that's 2 stars gone on its own. the 3rd missing star is that I already know it's filled with adds. and adds suck. no I won't pay to play

I'm usually a board game person. But 6 year old son hipped me up bout this game. Has to be one of the smoothest game play controls out there. This is a KOOL game. Gives a decent amount of game play time before the inevitable ads kick in. They aren't to overbearing yet. GREAT GAME!
I really like this game but my name all of a sudden disappeared. I just appeared as player now. I was about to buy the ad free version, but I noticed my name disappeared. :(
Great game. I personally feel like there isn't enough time to collect all of the points to defeat the different bosses, but otherwise, it's a great game.

TOTALLY RIGGED,& A new low with forced adds, when you start beating it all of a sudden, bam your not on top and bam you lose which means that all the makers games are a scam and rigged!!! and if Google Play allows it then they are in on it..
This game drags big time. Some other plays are fast somehow and will eat you. You can't see very far ahead of where your going and someone can bite your tail off.

It was going good till the last update now I can't play it nothing happens my snake doesn't move at all the time rans out and the screen goes black can't do anything this is the 2nd time something has happened like this
